{"id":381763339,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 4 months","timestamp":1597591915,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/381763339/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Operations to Make Array Equal","memory":"5.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minOperations(int n) {\n        int s = 0;\n        for(int i = 0;i<n;i++){\n            s += 2*i+1;\n        }\n        int avg = s/n;\n        int ans = 0;\n        for(int i = 0;i<n/2;i++){\n            ans += (avg - (2*i + 1));\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-operations-to-make-array-equal"}
